summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting the redevelopment proposal of City Building Company to purchase and develop a parcel in the Yesler-Atlantic Neighborhood Improvement Project area (Wash. R-5); authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute and deliver contracts and deeds; authorizing the Director of the Housing and Neighborhood Development Division to Administer the "Contract for Sale of Land"; designating the disposition of sales proceeds; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
